title: Hiroaki Okuno (footballer)
text:
is a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who plays for <a href="Cerezo%20Osaka">Cerezo Osaka</a> as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Career.
Okuno started his career at <a href="Vegalta%20Sendai">Vegalta Sendai</a>, signing professional forms in 2012 after graduating through the youth set-up. He made his <a href="J.%20League%20Division%201">J. League</a> debut against <a href="Kawasaki%20Frontale">Kawasaki Frontale</a> at <a href="Todoroki%20Athletics%20Stadium">Todoroki Stadium</a>.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 26 February 2019".
1
